ERROR_ON_SAVE: An error occurred while saving data. Please try again.
LOGOUT_MESSAGE: Do you really want to logout from app? Unsynced surveys will disappear.
UPLOAD_SURVEY_MESSAGE: Do you want to upload the surveys?
ENTER_VALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
SALESFORCE_OBJECT_CREATION_ERROR: Error while creating record on salesforce.
DELETE_MESSAGE: Are you sure to delete this survey? This cannot be undone.
SYNC_MESSAGE: Are you sure to upload this survey? This cannot be undone.
HEROKU_APP_NAME_DESCRIPTION: Enter your Heroku app name. For example, if the URL of your Heroku app is https://aaa-bbb-12345.herokuapp.com, enter aaa-bbb-12345. Ask your administrator for details.
CONTACT_ERROR_INVALID_FIELD_WORKER_RECOR: Field worker record is not found or duplicated. Check your Salesforce org.
CONTACT_ERROR_UNEXPECTED: Unexpected error occurred while retrieving your contact record. Contact your administrator.
CONTACT_ERROR_JUNCTION_QUERY: Unexpected error occurred while retrieving field worker-client relationship records. Contact your administrator.
CONTACT_ERROR_JUNCTION_UNEXPECTED: Unexpected error occurred while saving field worker-client relationship records. Contact your administrator.
METADATA_ERROR_INVALID_PACKAGE_VERSION: Salesforce package is not installed or is old. Install at least version
METADATA_ERROR_INVALID_RECORD_TYPE: Invalid record type found on Field Survey object. Contact your administrator.
METADATA_ERROR_NO_EDITABLE_FIELDS: No editable fields on Survey layout. Contact your administrator.
METADATA_ERROR_UNEXPECTED: Unexpected error occurred while retrieving survey settings. Contact your administrator.
SETTINGS_REFRESH_NOT_READY: You cannot reload metadata and surveys until all the surveys are synced.
SETTINGS_REFRESH_SUCCESS: Unexpected error occurred while refreshing. Contact your administrator and login again.
SETTINGS_NO_INTERNET: No network connection. Confirm your network connectivity and try again.
SURVEY_LIST_LOADING_ERROR: Unexpected error occurred while loading survey list. Contact your administrator and login again.
SURVEY_SYNC_ERROR_UNEXPECTED: Unexpected error occurred while uploading. Contact your administrator.
